languages.text: {n}Осторожно семеня по мощеной дороге, возвращается Мейв — сжимая в руках наполненный до краев кубок.{/n} "Ваш амасек, господин. Не расплескала ни капли!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Осторожно семеня по мощеной дороге, возвращается Лидзи — сжимая в руках наполненный до краев кубок.{/n} "Ваш амасек, господин. Не расплескала ни капли!"

languages.text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"
languages.original_text: {n}Осторожно семеня по мощеной дороге, возвращается Мейв — сжимая в руках наполненный до краев кубок.{/n} "Ваш амасек, господин. Не расплескала ни капли!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, sir. I haven't spilt a drop!"
{n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, sir. I haven't spilt a drop!"
{n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, sir. I haven't spilt a drop!"
{n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, sir. I haven't spilt a drop!"
{n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"
{n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"

languages.text: {n}Maive kehrt mit schnellen, vorsichtigen Schritten und einem randvollen Becher in der Hand zurück.{/n} "Euer Amasec, Lord. Ich habe keinen Tropfen verschüttet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive kehrt mit schnellen, vorsichtigen Schritten und einem randvollen Becher in der Hand zurück.{/n} "Euer Amasec, Lord. Ich habe keinen Tropfen verschüttet!"

languages.text: {n}Maive revient en marchant d'un pas à la fois rapide et prudent, une coupe remplie à ras bord dans les mains.{/n} « Votre amasec, mon seigneur. Je n'en ai pas renversé une goutte ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive revient en marchant d'un pas à la fois rapide et prudent, une coupe remplie à ras bord dans les mains.{/n} « Votre amasec, mon seigneur. Je n'en ai pas renversé une goutte ! »

languages.text: {n}メイヴが戻ってきた。舗装された道を慎重に、しかし素早く歩きながら、なみなみと注がれた酒杯を手にしている。{/n}「アマセックをお持ちしました、裁判官様。一滴もこぼしておりません！」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴが戻ってきた。舗装された道を慎重に、しかし素早く歩きながら、なみなみと注がれた酒杯を手にしている。{/n}「アマセックをお持ちしました、裁判官様。一滴もこぼしておりません！」

languages.text: {n}Maive vuelve, andando rápida y cuidadosamente por el camino pavimentado con un cáliz lleno en sus manos.{/n} «Su amasec, milord. ¡No he derramado ni una gota!».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive vuelve, andando rápida y cuidadosamente por el camino pavimentado con un cáliz lleno en sus manos.{/n} «Su amasec, milord. ¡No he derramado ni una gota!».

languages.text: {n}梅芙回来了，她手里端着满溢的酒杯，沿着铺好的路面小心翼翼地走了过来。{/n}“您的艾玛赛克酒，大人，我一滴都没洒！”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙回来了，她手里端着满溢的酒杯，沿着铺好的路面小心翼翼地走了过来。{/n}“您的艾玛赛克酒，大人，我一滴都没洒！”

languages.text: {n}Maive, elinde ağzına kadar dolu kadehle taş döşeli zeminde dikkatli adımlar atarak dönüyor.{/n} "Amasekiniz lordum. Tek bir damlası bile dökülmedi!"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive returns, taking quick careful steps along the paved road, a brimming goblet in her hands.{/n} "Your amasec, my lord. I haven't spilt a drop!"
